mapper.insert: insert into w_pay (pay_id, pay_user_id, pay_order_number, pay_transaction_number, pay_money, pay_time, pay_staus) values (#{payId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTransactionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{payStaus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update w_pay set pay_user_id = #{payUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_order_number = #{payOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_transaction_number = #{payTransactionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=DATE}, pay_staus = #{payStaus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pay_id, pay_user_id, pay_order_number, pay_transaction_number, pay_money, pay_time, pay_staus from w_pay where pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pay_id, pay_user_id, pay_order_number, pay_transaction_number, pay_money, pay_time, pay_staus from w_pay
